channel.title: Hlp makin combat lvl limit higher
channel.description: can some1 hlp me, max stats on my server is 99 but for some reason the highest combat lvl is 185, can some1 tell me how to make the highest combat lvl like 253 for example. no 1 has been able to hlp me out on this. can some1 experienced hlp me please, thanks and WHERE DO I CHANGE MAX STATS TO 135 you have not explained that

item.title: Hlp makin combat lvl limit higher
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.source: Hlp makin combat lvl limit higher

item.title: Hlp makin combat lvl limit higher
item.dc:creator: @jackeychan jackeychan
item.description:
@jackeychan wrote:

Search for ‘int getlevelforxp’, in client.java should look like:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}

[/code]
now where u see the two 99s change to 135 =D

Read full topic
